plot: Merlina is the best detective agency in the country. They fight crime and injustice, from kidnapping to theft, from drugs trafficking to protection. And on their path, they meet master criminal Sardonis over and over again.
plot_en: Merlina is the best detective agency in the country. They fight crime and injustice, from kidnapping to theft, from drugs trafficking to protection. And on their path, they meet master criminal Sardonis over and over again.

title: Merlina
